title: Legal-Bay Lawsuit Settlement Funding Announces Readiness to Fund Cases in Columbus Day Rush within 24 Hours
text:
Legal-Bay LLC
Lawsuit Cash Advance Firm says that while most people are taking off in observance of the holiday, the company is focused on servicing their clients' needs and working to get plaintiffs approvals within 12-24 hours.
CHERRY HILL, N.J. , Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Legal-Bay LLC, The Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company, a leader in lawsuit funding services and excellent customer service, announced today that they are prepared for the Columbus Day rush of applications, with a readiness to fund cases within 12-24 hours of approval. Columbus Day is typically a day where people catch up on shopping and errands, but it's also a time when people call and put in applications. The staff at Legal-Bay have noticed that during the more laid-back holidays, people spend time doing things that they've put off due to life's demands. Inquiring about a potential lawsuit or receiving a cash advance for an expected settlement or verdict is something many people do during this time, especially because with holidays typically comes more money spending. Legal-Bay understands the stress a lack of funds can put on people and their families, and it is for this reason that they try to help their clients the best they can, especially during the holidays. Most companies in the legal funding industry typically have an approval process with at least 48 hours, however, Legal-Bay has added additional staff in order to be able to fund more cases and accept more applications with an even faster turnaround time than just 24 hours. Legal-Bay also has low monthly usage rates â€“ less than 2% in some cases. Additionally, Legal-Bay is willing to assist those who have already received prior funding, while most companies don't assist plaintiffs who have previously received a lawsuit cash advance with another company.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20140714/126845
Legal-Bay, a lawsuit cash advance firm, is a lawsuit pre-settlement funding company that provides cash advances to plaintiffs while they're awaiting payments prior to case settlements. The cash advances are on a non-recourse basis, meaning the plaintiff only needs to repay the advance if the case is successful. Legal-Bay dos not buy the full claim but only advances a small portion of the expected settlement amount. Any fees or expenses accrued on the advance will be repaid by the plaintiff's lawyer if and when the case is officially settled and paid.
Chris Janish , CEO of Legal-Bay, commented on the company's commitment to assisting their clients during the holidays, "As many people are taking off in observance of Columbus Day to catch up on errands, our company is focused on servicing our clients' needs. We anticipate a sharp rise in plaintiffs who are finally getting around to applying for a much needed cash advance."
To see the full list of cases Legal-Bay funds, or to apply for the 12-24-hour approval process on your lawsuit settlement funding request, visit: http://lawsuitssettlementfunding.com
Legal-Bay's programs are non-recourse lawsuit cash advances, also known as case funding. None of the programs should be considered to be a settlement loan, settlement loans, lawsuit loan, lawsuit loans, pre-settlement loans, or a pre-settlement loan. To learn more about Legal-Bay's Funding Process visit: http://www.lawsuitssettlementfunding.com/funding-process.php
To apply right now for pre-settlement or settlement lawsuit funding which will be approved within 24 hours, feel free to contact Legal-Bay on the company's 24-hour hotline at: 877.571.0405.
You may also fill out an online application to receive a free evaluation on your case at: http://lawsuitssettlementfunding.com
Legal-Bay LLC (as well as their related companies) is not a law firm and cannot provide legal advice on your case, however, Legal-Bay works with lawyers involved in mass tort litigations who can provide you with a free legal consultation at the consumer's direction.
